name: COIN Impact: Operation Thunderhead
blurb: COIN Impact is a veteran-owned web game for casual gamers, building community through play and charity.

rewards.reward: Receive 2 stacks of in-game coins (50 total) when we launch our BETA. BETA will take place a few months after ALPHA. Still get your name on our website as a supporter. (estimated value of coins $10)
Receive an invitation to our closed ALPHA, and 1 pile of in-game coins (100). This and every higher reward will get your name on our website as an ALPHA supporter. (estimated value of coins $20)
Receive an invitation to our closed ALPHA and a limited edition ALPHA release in-game companion. This companion will scale with you as you play and heal you as your fight.

Receive a special in-game boost package, unique to Kickstarter. This package contains powerful random boosts and items. Also receive an invitation to the closed ALPHA and 1 mound of premium coins (250). (estimated coin value $100)

Receive a real COIN Impact Challenge Coin which will be shipped to you with a (very) special code which can be used in a future campaign. Also receive a very special limited edition ALPHA release in-game Weapon which will sometimes attack twice. Also receive invitation to the closed ALPHA and one crate of premium coins (500). (estimated coin value $100)

Advanced ALPHA starter pack. Receive a special COIN Impact t-shirt for you to wear, as well as a matching in-game shirt (with special properties). Also receive an invitation to the closed ALPHA, the boost pack, a unique ALPHA-release chest armor and weapon, AND 1 pile of premium coins (100). (estimated coin value $20)

Ultimate ALPHA starter pack. You will get your choice of ANY 7 COIN Impact items, now or in the future. You pick how this unique power is best used! Also receive the physical coin, physical t-shirt, a large version of the boost pack, 2 crates of premium coins (1000). \r\n\r\nYou will be well-suited for our upcoming... contests. (estimated coin value $200)

Have your face (or the face of a loved one) as a permanent part of the game as an early-play squad member. We would love for this to be a place to honor current or wounded/deceased service members. Also includes an invitation to the closed ALPHA, 2 crates of premium coins (1000), the unlimited ALPHA weapon and armor, large Kickstarter boost package, AND physical coin and t-shirt. Game items are transferable, once. (estimated coin value $200)
Become a corporate sponsor and featured on a banner above the game for 1 month. Be a part of something special, and show that your business cares about reaching veterans.

Be our premier corporate sponsor. Your company will be featured in banner advertising for 3 months, and your corporate logo or product will be placed in the game. It could be inserted as prominent environment artwork (such as a worn billboard in a city) or wearable items (if you make a wearable product). You can also write a blog post which will be linked from the main game page.
